location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 420 of 1852 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication from the Resident (No. 9) dated 20 October 1852, which conveyed news that the 'Arab Chiefs' had consented to the continued operation of the Maritime Truce 1843 until June 1853; it is noted that this is 'very satisfactory'.
